$2/off-peak hour       Hitachi Fluorescence Spectrometer    Hitachi    SIF**    $5/peak hour; $2/off-peak hour       MicroCal VP-ITC MicroCalorimeter    MicroCal    SIF**    $5/peak hour; $2/off-peak hour       Perkin Elmer 2400 Series II CHNS/O Elemental Analyzer    Perkin Elmer    SIF*    $10/run       Peak hour: 9 am to 5 pm, off-peak hour: 5 pm to 9 am     SIF* - Shared Instrumentation Facility (Brown 357)    SIF** - Annex (Silver 720)    *** Please visit the X-ray Diffraction Facility web page for details.       - updated on Nov. 8, 2012 -            Updated on 11/13/2012                     * | Contact Us | © New York University , Arts and Science
